page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT,WITHERNSEA
page.content: There are 6 night clubs,many of which are open all the year,although some only open at weekends during the winter months.These clubs are situated both in the town itself and on the caravan and chalet parks.Few big name entertainers visit the area and most acts are locally based. The main all purpose venue is the Grand Pavillion.This occasionally attempts to put on big name acts, usually pop groups,although for much of its time it serves as a community centre.Many courses and clubs operate during the day e.g. aerobics, weight -lifting,badminton,yoga,self-defence. Even tea dances are held.It is run by the local authority and since it makes a loss it lives with the threat of closure.However it does have its successes,notably the regular holding of antique,trade and craft fairs.
